text: Romeo Must Die is a 2000 American action movie. It was the first movie to be directed by Andrzej Bartkowiak. The movie starred Jet Li, Aaliyah, Isaiah Washington, DMX, Russell Wong, Terry Chen, Delroy Lindo, Anthony Anderson, Edoardo Ballerini. It was distributed by Warner Bros. Romeo Must Die is loosely based on the William Shakespeare play Romeo and Juilet'. ==Refernces== ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:2000 action movies Category:American action movies Category:Martial arts movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Andrzej Bartkowiak Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in Hong Kong Category:Movies set in Vancouver
title: Romeo Must Die
